verses.name: 1 Kings 1:44
verses.text: And the king hath sent with him Zadok the priest, and Nathan the prophet, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and the Cherethites, and the Pelethites, and they have caused him to ride upon the king’s mule:

verses.name: 1 Kings 1:45
verses.text: And Zadok the priest and Nathan the prophet have anointed him king in Gihon: and they are come up from thence rejoicing, so that the city rang again. This is the noise that ye have heard.

verses.name: 1 Kings 1:46
verses.text: And also Solomon sitteth on the throne of the kingdom.
